items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy!!
items.body: Gordy for my mother-in-law! She loves it! Read more
items.author: Pam Bedsole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultra-Soft, Fluffy, And Snuggly Oversized Cardigan
items.body: I ordered this Women's Open Front Cardigan in size XL and Light Taupe, and it's absolutely wonderful. The fabric feels just like some of my soft fuzzy robes, and it feels terrific against my skin. The fabric is warming, but not too heavy. Because it's a fluffy cloud-like material, it's very easy to wear. I love the Light Taupe color which matches nicely with everything I wear. I'm 5'6", about 190 lbs, and have a bust size of 44F, and this fits me perfectly and loosely. I can easily pull one side of the front across the other side if I'm cold. I especially love the shawl collar because it keeps my neck warm with it's soft fluff. The oversized sleeves hang halfway down my hands when I stand up. The sleeves can be rolled back if you want, and it stays put. The length hits my legs about halfway down my thighs. An excellent value for the money because this Oversized Cardigan has everything I've been looking for in a fluffy ribbed knit shawl collar sweater. I highly recommend, and I'm planning on ordering this in white because of the Light Taupe Cardigan's high-quality materials and craftsmanship at a reasonable price. Read more
items.author: Kristin West-Sauve

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and cuddly
items.body: This oversized knit cardigan is one of the softest materials I’ve ever worn. It genuinely feels like wrapping up in a blanket. The knit is thick and warm, perfect for lounging or layering on cold days. The fit is intentionally very roomy (I’d say about a size larger than I expected), which adds to its comfort but gives it a slouchy, relaxed look. For me, it’s not structured enough for wearing out, but it’s ideal for cozy nights at home. The light neutral shade is versatile and looks faintly pink in certain lighting, which I actually find adds a bit of charm. Read more
items.author: M&M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a light sweater
items.body: This is a heavy sweater - almost a coat. The sweater is very squishy and soft. The fabric is reminiscent of a chenille housecoat (see the closeup picture.) It is oversized, so is longer and wider than a regular sweater - being oversized it fits almost everyone. The sweater has two pockets. The style is cowl collar and open front. The fabric is very heavy and nicely knit. It is well constructed with nice seams and no rough edges. I cannot stress the weight of the sweater. If you like heavy sweaters to snuggle into, this is perfect. If you are looking for a sweater to wear around the office, it might be a bit heavy. This sweater will work perfectly as a go-to-church coat, it is that heavy. I really like the style and comfort and how cushy the knit is. Read more
items.author: Shopping Fan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Feels great, looks meh
items.body: When it arrived, I thought it was a blanket. But it just feels as cozy as one. It's also warmer than I expected, upping the coziness. The sleeves are wide above the elbow to the shoulder, which I couldn't tell from the picture. I'm looking forward to throwing this on as a jacket when it's not quite cold enough for a winter jacket. However, it's not as sleek as it looks in the photo. It's very bulky, making me look at least 10 pounds larger. I'm not sure if sizing down would help. Read more
items.author: CP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft, Cozy, and Perfect for Cool Weather!
items.body: This sweater feels like wrapping up in a soft, cuddly blanket — honestly, it’s that comfy! It’s loose but still has a nice shape to it, so you can sit out in the cold, snuggle up, and feel oh so cozy. It’s definitely on the larger side, so if you don’t want that oversized fit, I’d suggest ordering your true size or even one down. I’m 5’5”–5’6” and about 135 lbs, and the small is still nice and roomy on me — exactly how I like it! Highly recommend this sweater as a perfect addition for those cool evenings outside. Read more
items.author: Daddy-O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
items.body: This is the softest, coziest, cuddliest sweater I have ever owned. Roomy, lightweight, very warm, and you can just throw it in the washer then the dryer. No fuss. I love it! I'm one of those people who is cold all the time. I always carry a wrap of some sort when I go out -- air conditioning makes me ache. This is so handy to carry, weighs nothing, is quite warm, and I don't have to worry about soiling it because it is so easy care. Read more
items.author: Auntie Annie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and nice
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This sweater is soft, warm, and elegant. It has 2 good-sized pockets and is still stylish. It feels finely woven and while it stretches, it's not the super loose stretch that you see in cheaper sweaters. It doesn't stretch down to your knee when you put your phone in your pocket. The sweater arrived in a super vacuum-sealed package that left significant wrinkles on the sweater for a bit and it had a very unpleasant factory smell to it. I dont want to wear it until I wash it. Read more
items.author: Nadia Dominique Kimber

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Taupe, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
